welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fountain, where small-town charm meets breathtaking natural beauty. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Colorado Springs Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The west terminal at Colorado Springs Airport serves regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at USAF Academy Airstrip Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at USAF Academy Airstrip Airport is dedicated to serving the needs of military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers and visitors.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butts AAF Airport is a small building with basic amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
